name: AnimeQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open anime quiz”
”Alexa, start anime quiz”
”Alexa, launch anime quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anime quiz
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Anime Quiz" is a skill game that tests your knowledge about the world's most viewed anime.
Users are asked questions and must answer with a "yes" or "no."

The anime questions in the game are for: 
- Naruto
- Dragonball Z
- Demon Slayer
- Pokemon 
- One Piece
- Attack on Titan

 Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.

The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.

Try the multiplayer mode to challenge friends and family! 

Find out who will be the winner of this great Anime Quiz.

Have fun!

*The skill was not developed in collaboration with the listed anime, it is an unofficial skill developed independently
